original: @327b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @327b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya t'a re sto tra /
analyzed: a'arya t'a re sto tra /
translated: Āryatārāsthotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of Noble Tārā

original: rje btsun thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the most venerable one of great compassion!

original: 'od dpag med kyi smon lam ma //🔽me tog zla mdzes sems bskyed ma //
analyzed: 'od dpag med kyi smon lam ma // me tog zla mdzes sems bskyed ma //
translated: The aspiration of Amitābha,🔽The generation of bodhicitta by Supuṣpacandra,

original: 'jig rten mgon gyi chu skyes ma //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon gyi chu skyes ma //
translated: The lotus of Lokanātha,

original: phyag gi mthil na bzhin bzangs ma //
analyzed: phyag gi mthil na bzhin bzangs ma //
translated: The beautiful face in the palm of the hand,

original: stong rgyas me tog phreng 'dzin ma //🔽bgres mo bgying bag drang po ma //
analyzed: stong rgyas me tog phreng 'dzin ma // bgres mo bgying bag drang po ma //
translated: The garland-holder of a thousand flowers,🔽The dignified and upright one,

original: gshegs shing bzhugs pa ldem ldem ma //
analyzed: gshegs shing bzhugs pa ldem ldem ma //
translated: The swaying one when walking and sitting,

original: phrag rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ma //
analyzed: phrag rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ma //
translated: The pleasing body with broad shoulders,

original: gsung gi dbang phyug dbyangs snyan ma //
analyzed: gsung gi dbang phyug dbyangs snyan ma //
translated: The melodious one, the lord of speech,

original: dran pa tsam gyis byin rlob ma //
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyis byin rlob ma //
translated: The one who blesses merely by being remembered,

original: yum ni 'dod pa'i sku mnga' ma //
analyzed: yum ni 'dod pa'i sku mnga' ma //
translated: The mother with a body of desired form,

original: bde gshegs dbu yi gtsug tor ma //
analyzed: bde gshegs dbu yi gtsug tor ma //
translated: The uṣṇīṣa on the head of the Sugata,

original: rgyal bas dbang bskur cod pan ma //
analyzed: rgyal bas dbang bskur cod pan ma //
translated: The crown of consecration by the Victorious Ones,

original: pho nyas dus min 'chi slu ma //
analyzed: pho nyas dus min 'chi slu ma //
translated: The messenger who deceives untimely death,

original: spyan nas thugs rje'i chu 'dzag ma //
analyzed: spyan nas thugs rje'i chu 'dzag ma //
translated: The one whose eyes drip tears of compassion,

original: dge slong sdom brtson dam tshig ma //
analyzed: dge slong sdom brtson dam tshig ma //
translated: The one with the discipline of a fully ordained monk,

original: bdag med brtse bas mthar phyin ma //
analyzed: bdag med brtse bas mthar phyin ma //
translated: You are the perfection of compassion, free of self.

original: sa dgu 'das pa'i pha rol ma //
analyzed: sa dgu 'das pa'i pha rol ma //
translated: You are the one who has gone beyond the ninth stage.

original: ma byon snga dro gzhon nu ma //
analyzed: ma byon snga dro gzhon nu ma //
translated: In the future, you are the youthful maiden.

original: da lta nyin gung dar bab ma //
analyzed: da lta nyin gung dar bab ma //
translated: In the present, you are the youthful maiden.

original: 'das so bgres mo dgongs ka ma //
analyzed: 'das so bgres mo dgongs ka ma //
translated: In the past, you are the aged woman.

original: dus gsum 'gyur ba'i mi rtag ma //🔽'jigs @328a * //
analyzed: dus gsum 'gyur ba'i mi rtag ma // 'jigs @328a * //
translated: You are impermanent, changing through the three times.

original: chen brgyad las skyob mdzad ma //
analyzed: chen brgyad las skyob mdzad ma //
translated: You are the one who protects from the eight great fears.

original: phra mo chen mo sgrub stsol ma //
analyzed: phra mo chen mo sgrub stsol ma //
translated: You are the one who accomplishes the great and the small.

original: mchog 'dod ma la mchod sbyin ma //
analyzed: mchog 'dod ma la mchod sbyin ma //
translated: You are the one who grants offerings to those who desire the supreme.

original: sems can gso ba'i'o rgyun ma //
analyzed: sems can gso ba'i'o rgyun ma //
translated: You are the stream of nectar that nourishes sentient beings.

original: dug sel sman mchog ma gi ma //
analyzed: dug sel sman mchog ma gi ma //
translated: You are the supreme medicine that removes poison.

original: sdig spong dge ba'i bdud rtsi ma //
analyzed: sdig spong dge ba'i bdud rtsi ma //
translated: You are the nectar of virtue that abandons negativity.

original: sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i rgyal yum ma //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i rgyal yum ma //
translated: You are the mother of the buddhas.

original: bdag la thugs rjes zhal ston ma //
analyzed: bdag la thugs rjes zhal ston ma //
translated: You are the one who shows your face with compassion to me.

original: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa chos kyi rje pandi ta 'bum phrag gsum pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa chos kyi rje pandi ta 'bum phrag gsum pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise to the noble Tara, the reverend lady, composed by the lord of dharma, the pandit of three hundred thousand, is complete.
